label: 菅原在良
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1043-1122). His mother's aunt was the author of the Sarashina nikki. Erudite" of literature. Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (24) Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (8), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (1), Kyūreishū, and Wakan kensakushū. Prose pieces in Chōya gunsai. [更級日記、漢詩、鳩嶺集、和漢兼作集、朝野群載] "
